_sText:
<center><font face="verdana" size="3">Hosties Underground</font></center><font face="verdana" size="1">
______________________________________

Made by Paper-Cut. 
______________________________________

After being fed up with the low quality hosties maps that were flooding the hosties servers, I took it upon myself to make a hosties map that was not only balanced in terms of gameplay, but also visually appealing. The map's theme is loosely based on de_nuke, and is basically a hybrid between ultra-realism and unbelievability. The map contains 2 (large) jail cells, a wall, a gun pit, t spawn (complete with rebel way), gun toss, a pit for chicken fight/knife fight/western shootout, and a shot for shot arena. Also included with the map is a radar overlay. Note: The radar has a small bug where it stretches once outside of the boundaries of the map (you'll see what I mean). From what I could tell, it's nothing to worry about.
______________________________________

Install: Put the bsp into cstrike/maps folder.
______________________________________

Thanks goes out to:

Ryan Sterner, for help with optimization.
TAG Servers, for hosting both betas and providing various feedback from the playerbase
Etrigan, for ideas and testing along the way.
Turkey Eater, for ideas and testing along the way.
_______________________________________

http://forums.solidsurf.info
http://www.interlopers.net
http://www.tagservers.com</font>
